"Artie": "Do you know about the Advanced Trainia facilities here in Kvaris?"
"Folks say there are Trainia aimed at more advanced ARKS."
"Sounds kinda like the Trinitas facility in Retem, don't you think?"
"Do you know about the Advanced Trainia facilities here in Kvaris?"
"They're the usual virtual-space training facilities, but with a bit of a twist."
"It looks like they were used by our ancestor ARKS in Kvaris way back when, but... those facilities are definitely still running."
"If you're interested, want me to tell you about them?"
"How've you taken to the Advanced Trainia?"

"You've got some serious skill. You should make a point of
trying to hone your abilities."
